snippet.title: Official Launch Nov 24, 2023 | Soul Knight Prequel
snippet.description:
📢#soulknightprequel is gearing up for a global release on November 24, 2023, kicking off Season 0: Romance Dawn. We can't wait to embark on this epic adventure with players worldwide.

❗However, we cannot provide a confirmed release date for Soul Knight Prequel in Vietnam due to local regulation issues. Rest assured, this setback will not dampen our commitment to delivering the game to our passionate Vietnamese player community. We are actively working to navigate these regulatory challenges and aim to bring the Soul Knight Prequel to players in Vietnam as swiftly as possible.

Keep an eye on our official channels for the latest announcements, and thank you for being part of the Soul Knight Prequel community!

✅Make sure to reserve your spot:
Google Play: https://bit.ly/3Qo0gIa
iOS: https://bit.ly/3QoesRA
*iOS pre-registration is re-opened, so double-check you're in!
